name: KillingRoom
description:
KillingRoom is a first-person shooter in which you have to kill hordes of enemies by clearing rooms. There will be a boss at the end of each location. Each enemy has its own characteristics and behavior. There are several types of weapons in the game. There is only one level in the game. since this is a Demo version of the game. In the future, we will add 4 more levels, as well as new unique bosses, replace aimations and add the ability to pick up barrels and throw them towards enemies. We also plan to add puzzles, parkour and secret rooms to the game.
We are novice developers, so we ask you not to judge our project strictly.
